front.title: •Where Are Those Droidekas?! (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Non-unique destroyer droids are deploy -1 and forfeit +1. While all your characters at sites are destroyer droids and Neimoidians, opponent's characters are defense value -1 (to a minimum of 3) for each destroyer droid present. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: When two Jedi are attempting to breach your bridge, even a destroyer droid's response time seems far too slow.
